body_html:
On my laptop I can generate about 200MB worth of truncated normal randoms in half a second. For your original issue of truncated normal taking 400ms, the question is -- how big is it, and how long you were expecting it to take.

Session.run overhead can be 100 usec. If your random normal taking 400ms like in the original timeline then GPU time is definitely significant
